programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Amelia takes matters into her own hands and orders Ramon to kill Rhian and to spy on Tiago. Meanwhile, Marcial and Ethan try to discern Rhian's involvement in Buddy's arrest. Later, Rhian sneaks into Sec. Banzon's mansion to find some evidence. At the same time, Marcial arrives with his troop and the police to hand Sec. Banzon an arrest warrant. Meanwhile, Jessie continues to pursue Rhian in Bataan.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert resolves to admit the truth once and for all which does not sit well with Daniela, who worries that her father will reveal her crimes against Romina. Robert informs his wife of his decision and asks her to meet him at the police station. Unknown to them, Hector is pulling some strings to thwart the Mondragon patriarch’s plans.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert’s loved ones are frantic with worry as they wait for updates from the search and rescue operation. An emotional Marga finds herself in another clash with Cassie, who is trying her best to keep calm amid the horrendous tragedy. Meanwhile, Romina refuses to accept the possibility of Robert's death. Soon after, Romina passes out upon learning that foul play was involved in the incident.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Jean's attention is drawn away from Sonia when Gabriel, the man wrongfully accused of killing Edward, appeals for justice. Meanwhile, Paco and Anna kick off their getaway gtrip to Baler by visiting Edward's grave.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: With the recent developments on Edward's case, Jean is forced to put her advocacy on hold but remains determined to help the policy holders, especially Sonya. Meanwhile, Jacob and Roman begin to take measures to keep their dirty secrets hidden.

programme.title: Kasal
programme.desc: A woman, who is set to marry an eligible bachelor and budding politician, is forced to deal with an ex-boyfriend who is hell-bent on winning her back.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: As the race begins, Bianca clings to her lucky umbrella, but Carlos takes it away to help her focus. She finishes second and captures the media's attention. While searching for her lost item, Bianca encounters Gabriel, which makes Carlos feel uneasy.

programme.title: No Other Woman
programme.desc: An adventurous woman dares a married man not to fall in love with her. The challenge blossoms into an affair with dangerous consequences when his wife discovers his infidelity.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Iris musters the courage to introduce herself to her father, Robert. Meanwhile, Nestor is thrilled by the news that he and Valerie will soon return to the Philippines.

programme.title: Till I Met You
programme.desc: Disheartened after speaking with her father, Iris finds a shoulder to cry on in Basti. Meanwhile, Ali crosses paths with Nico.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Tiago threatens Isabelle into revealing Rhian's whereabouts. Rhian eventually arrives to rescue Isabelle and her friends from Barrio Sto. Francisco. Meanwhile, Jessie finally gets a lead on Rhian's whereabouts. Lilybeth later warns Rhian about Jessie's investigation. Elsewhere, Claire urges Ethan to move on from his breakup with Rhian.

programme.title: The General's Daughter
programme.desc: Marcial orders Jessie to interrogate the suspected members of the illegal drug and gun smuggling syndicate. When the suspects refuse to talk, he takes matters into his own hands and soon discovers Tiago's connection to the said syndicate. Meanwhile, Corazon impresses her client and gets an offer to cater Oscar Villavicencio's event. However, as she takes on the gig, Corazon encounters a familiar face.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Robert's disappearance takes its toll on Romina. After a fruitless search and rescue operation, Romina's fear worsens as the authorities presume her husband dead. Seeing how depressed her mother is over Robert's disappearance, Cassie tries to stay strong for Romina. Meanwhile, Daniela sets aside her differences with Romina for Robert's funeral.

programme.title: Kadenang Ginto
programme.desc: Daniela confronts Alvin about his involvement in Robert's death and is caught off guard when Alvin presents a piece of evidence on Romina's real rapist. Meanwhile, Romina tries her best to move on without Robert, but is determined to seek justice for her husband's untimely passing. In her quest to find out the truth, Romina makes a shocking discovery about Robert's last moments.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: An unfortunate event befalls Anna and Paco as their trip comes to an end. Deciding to get one step ahead, Jacob starts to uncover Sonya and Paco's real intentions.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan
programme.desc: Sonya finds herself at wit's end as she tries to keep the Lomostes away from her family. To make matters worse, Paco insists on pursuing a law career under Atty. Vega's mentorship.

programme.title: No Other Woman
programme.desc: An adventurous woman dares a married man not to fall in love with her. The challenge blossoms into an affair with dangerous consequences when his wife discovers his infidelity.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: Before leaving Zambales, Bianca catches up with Gabriel, inspiring him to finish his studies. As Carlos celebrates the success of Tiger Shark's event, Roman's anger grows when he learns that Carlos spent more on Bianca due to a family emergency.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang Ang Iibigin
programme.desc: As Carlos's financial support for Bianca proves fruitless, Roman decides to intervene. Gabriel heads to Manila to surprise Bianca, but his plan turns awry. Meanwhile, Maila confronts Victoria after learning about the incident.
